episodes.title: Cancelled
episodes.plot: Chef and the children learn that Earth is actually just a reality show for other planets. When they learn it is to be canceled, the boys travel to a distant planet to plead their case to the network executives.

episodes.title: Krazy Kripples
episodes.plot: Jimmy and Timmy land in the middle of a gang war; Stan, Cartman, Kenny and Kyle stay out of the way when stem cell research divides the town.

episodes.title: Toilet Paper
episodes.plot: The boys toilet paper their art teacher's house to get revenge for detention. When Kyle's guilty conscience makes him want to confess, Cartman makes an attempt on his life.

episodes.title: I'm a Little Bit Country
episodes.plot: The town is divided down the middle on the Iraq war issue. Therefore, Cartman tries to induce a flashback so that he can find out what the Founding Fathers would have to say about the war.

episodes.title: Fat Butt and Pancake Head
episodes.plot: Cartman makes a Jennifer Lopez hand doll and turns her into a music star, which draws the furious anger of the real Jennifer Lopez as well as the sexual advances of Ben Affleck.

episodes.title: Lil' Crime Stoppers
episodes.plot: After the boys start a Jr. Detective's Club and find a girl's missing doll, they are recruited by the county police department. Their first assignment: to break up a meth lab.

episodes.title: Red Man's Greed
episodes.plot: South Park residents are forced out of their homes when an Indian casino takes their land.

episodes.title: South Park Is Gay
episodes.plot: Kyle, Mr. Garrison and Mr. Slave travel to New York City to bring an end to the latest "metrosexual" fad, and discover that it's actually part of a crab-people conspiracy to take over the planet.

episodes.title: Christian Rock Hard
episodes.plot: Cartman, Butters, and Token soar to the top of the Christian rock charts, but when the other boys kick Cartman out, he seeks a way to get them back.

episodes.title: Grey Dawn
episodes.plot: South Park takes all of the driver's licenses away from its senior citizens, and the AARP responds by launching an armed invasion of the town to defend their rights.

episodes.title: Casa Bonita
episodes.plot: When Butters is invited to Kyle's birthday party instead of Cartman, Cartman kidnaps Butters and locks him in a bomb shelter.

episodes.title: All About Mormons
episodes.plot: Stan learns about the Mormon religion after a new family moves to South Park from Utah. Caught up in the family-friendly doctrine of the church, Randy declares the Marshes to be Mormon as well.

episodes.title: Butt Out
episodes.plot: Rob Reiner comes to town to lead an anti tobacco crusade after the boys briefly take up smoking.

episodes.title: Raisins
episodes.plot: Stan becomes inconsolable after Wendy breaks up with him, and Butters has a crush on a sexy waitress at a local restaurant.

episodes.title: It's Christmas in Canada
episodes.plot: The boys go to Canada to retrieve Ike, after his birth parents show up in South Park and claim him as their own.
